title: Health & Fitness
part1: What kind of food do you like to eat?
How important is health to you?
What do people in your country do to stay healthy?

part2.cue_card_topic: Describe a sport or physical activity you enjoy.
cue_card_points: and explain why you enjoy it.

part3: What are the benefits of regular exercise?
How can people be encouraged to live healthier lives?
Do you think technology has affected people's health?
